span.span:
Established in 1961 with the consolidation of Rockford Schools and Willshire Schools and the 1992 addition of the Mendon Union Schools
Parkway Local School District, in partnership with its parents and communities, provides our students with a variety of exceptional learning opportunities in a safe and caring environment so all Parkway students achieve academic excellence, integrity, and leadership to become successful life-long learners in a global society.

div.span:
Welcome to Parkway Local Schools​
Preparing for Excellence, Integrity and Success

strong.span: At the order of Governor Mike DeWine Parkway Local Schools are Closed
. Building offices are also closed. Staff will be checking and responding to voicemail and email during this shutdown period.
